headline: KMTS, Biobeat Partner to Expand Diagnostic Insight in Cardiac Recovery
summary: Kestra teams up with Biobeat in an exclusive deal, investing $5M to add continuous blood pressure monitoring to the ASSURE WCD during cardiac recovery.
